A '''potato battery''' is a toggleable block that emits a [[redstone signal]] and damages [[entities]] above it when activated in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
A potato battery can be broken using any tool with equal efficiency, and always drops itself.
{{Breaking row|horizontal=1|Potato Battery}}

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting

== Usage ==
=== Redstone signal ===
When {{control|used}}, a potato battery toggles its state. When active, it emits a redstone signal of 15.

=== Damage ===
If an entity is on top of it while it is active, the entity is damaged by {{hp|0.5}} per tick. However, due to [[damage immunity]], the entity actually receives damage only every half a second.

== Trivia ==
*In real life, {{w|Lemon battery#Variations|potato batteries|newtab=1}} are a type of electrochemical battery often created for educational purposes. These batteries employ reactions between copper and zinc electrodes and the acidic electrolytes inside the potato to produce power.
